import React, { useState } from "react" import icon from "../../../../img/SEO/SEO Icons (8).png" import styles from "./Tool.module.css" import { ITool } from "./tool.interfase" export const Tool = ({text, icon, subText}: ITool) => { const [hovered, setHovered] = useState(false) return (
setHovered(true)} onMouseLeave={() => setHovered(false)}>
{icon}

{text}

{subText}

Подробнее →
{/* {hovered ? <>

{subText}

Подробнее →
: null} */}
) }
